trans-unit.source: Contains <xref:System.Net.IPAddress> values used to join and drop multicast groups.
trans-unit.target: Contém <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>valores utilizados para associar e largar os grupos de multicast.</xref:System.Net.IPAddress>

trans-unit.source: Use a MulticastOption to store the <xref:System.Net.IPAddress> of a multicast group you want to join or drop.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar um MulticastOption para armazenar o <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>de um grupo de multicast que pretende associar ou remova.</xref:System.Net.IPAddress>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method with the following parameters to join a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método com os parâmetros seguintes para aderir a um grupo de multicast.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: |Parameter|Value| |---------------|-----------| |socketOptionLevel|<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel?displayProperty=fullName>| |socketOptionName|<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName>| |object|MulticastOption| Use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName> to drop a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: | Parâmetro | Valor | |---------------|-----------| | socketOptionLevel | <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel?displayProperty=fullName>| | socketOptionName | <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName>| | objeto | MulticastOption | Utilize <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName>para remover um grupo de multicast.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new version of the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.MulticastOption"></xref> class for the specified IP multicast group.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova versão do <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.MulticastOption"> </xref> classe para o grupo de multicast IP especificado.

trans-unit.source: For machines with multiple network cards, do not use this constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para máquinas com várias placas de rede, utilize este construtor.

trans-unit.source: Use the constructor that takes a group and a local IP address.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o construtor que utiliza um grupo e um endereço IP local.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.IPAddress> of the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>do grupo de multicast.</xref:System.Net.IPAddress>

trans-unit.source: group is .
trans-unit.target: groupis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.MulticastOption"></xref> class with the specified IP multicast group address and interface index.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.MulticastOption"> </xref> classe com o IP multicast grupo endereço e a interface de índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.IPAddress> of the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>do grupo de multicast.</xref:System.Net.IPAddress>

trans-unit.source: The index of the interface that is used to send and receive multicast packets.
trans-unit.target: O índice da interface que é utilizada para enviar e receber pacotes multicast.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.MulticastOption"></xref> class with the specified IP multicast group address and local IP address associated with a network interface.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.MulticastOption"> </xref> classe com o multicast IP especificado grupo endereço e o endereço IP local associado uma interface de rede.

trans-unit.source: For machines with multiple network cards, you must use this constructor to create <xref:System.Net.Sockets.MulticastOption> instances.
trans-unit.target: Para máquinas com várias placas de rede, tem de utilizar este construtor para criar <xref:System.Net.Sockets.MulticastOption>instâncias.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.MulticastOption>

trans-unit.source: The group <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>.
trans-unit.target: O grupo <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>.</xref:System.Net.IPAddress>

trans-unit.source: The local <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>.
trans-unit.target: O local <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>.</xref:System.Net.IPAddress>

trans-unit.source: group is .
trans-unit.target: groupis .

trans-unit.source: -or- mcint is .
trans-unit.target: -or- mcint is .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the IP address of a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o endereço IP de um grupo de multicast.

trans-unit.source: Valid IP addresses for multicast packets are in the range 224.0.0.0 to 239.255.255.255.
trans-unit.target: São endereços IP válidos para pacotes multicast no intervalo 224.0.0.0 a 239.255.255.255.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Net.IPAddress> that contains the Internet address of a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>que contém o endereço Internet de um grupo de multicast.</xref:System.Net.IPAddress>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the interface that is used to send and receive multicast packets.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice da interface que é utilizada para enviar e receber pacotes multicast.

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the index of a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface> array element.
trans-unit.target: Um número inteiro que representa o índice de uma <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface>elemento de matriz.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the local address associated with a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o endereço local associado um grupo de multicast.

trans-unit.source: The LocalAddress property contains the IP address of the interface associated with the multicast group membership.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade LocalAddress contém o endereço IP da interface associada com a associação ao grupo de multicast.

trans-unit.source: If LocalAddress is set to <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>, the default interface is used.
trans-unit.target: Se LocalAddress é definido como <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>, a interface predefinida é utilizada.</xref:System.Net.IPAddress>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Net.IPAddress> that contains the local address associated with a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>que contém o endereço local associado um grupo de multicast.</xref:System.Net.IPAddress>
